site_name: Site Of Covent Garden Market Authority
description: Application under S96a of the Town & Country Planning Act for 'non-material' amendments (revisions to the approved drawings listed in Condition 1 to alter the configuration of the top floors (L49-52) of Building N8 in the Northern Site Development Zone) to planning permission ref. 2014/2810 dated 11/02/2015.
decision_conditions:
